name: Neil Cavuto
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Although a fiscal conservative, Neil Cavuto was a frequent critic of former President Trump. In fact, Cavuto so enraged the former President that Trump dedicated 20 minutes at a rally to attacking Cavuto. Neil Cavuto is a straight news reporter who often does not air his political views; however, he aligns with the right in support of low taxes and limited government when it comes to economics.

Scientific Views: Reports accurately on Covid-19 and rebuked former President Trump’s election fraud claims. Before 2014, Cavuto was skeptical of climate change; however, we cannot find any instances of him making statements on climate change after that point.
Social Views: Nothing confirmed.
twits: .@RepTonyGonzales to Neil: This can't be a partisan issue. This has to be in a bipartisan manner- how do we secure our border and keep all Americans safe?

Former U.S. Attorney General Bill Barr on Trump appealing Colorado's ballot ban: The effort to take him off the ballot and deny people the choice... We can't have all the states making their own rules as to what an insurrection is and evidence is needed to make a determination.
Kyle Bailey to Neil: This should not have happened. This problem will be corrected and the aircraft will be safe.

Former Deputy Assistant Attorney General Tom Dupree joins guest host Edward Lawrence to discuss the Colorado Republican party appealing to overturn Trump 2024 ballot ban

Former Deputy Assistant Attorney General Tom Dupree joins Neil to discuss the Supreme Court declining to fast-track Trump immunity dispute in blow to Special Counsel Jack Smith

name: Kaitlan Collins
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Kaitlan Collins is known for her frequent spars with former president Donald Trump. According to a Forbes interview, she describes the Trump administration as People who worked in the Trump White House were incredibly manipulative and would straight-up lie to you, so you had to filter through that.”
Scientific Views: She reports accurately on Covid-19.
Social Views: During her college years (2011), Kaitlan Collins sent homophobic tweets to which she apologized. (reported by the right-leaning observer.com)
twits: Gov. Sununu — who has endorsed Nikki Haley — says he would vote for Donald Trump if he's the Republican nominee even if he’s a convicted felon.

Gov. DeSantis criticizes the argument made by Trump’s attorney in court this week — that he could hypothetically order Seal Team Six to assassinate an opponent and only be charged after being impeached and convicted — and predicts he’ll lose that appeal and end up on trial in DC.

“Not having heard from you by the third extended deadline (noon today), I assume that Mr. Trump will not agree to the reasonable, lawful limits I have imposed as a precondition to giving a closing statement above and beyond those given by his attorneys, and that, therefore, he…

These were Engoron's terms from his email last week: “Thus, in my sole discretion, I will consent to let Mr. Trump make a closing argument if, and only if, through counsel by 1/9/2024, and by himself, personally, on the record, just before he speaks, he agrees to limit his…

The Democratic ranking chair on House Armed Services says Pres. Biden needs to evaluate his relationship with Secretary Austin. Asked if that means possibly firing him, Rep. Smith says it's a conversation for them but at the moment, I can't think of a plausible explanation.

President Biden found out today about Defense Secretary Austin's diagnosis. Nobody in the White House knew that Secretary Austin had prostate cancer until this morning, and the President was informed immediately after,John Kirby says.

On Secretary Austin from the doctors at Walter Reed: “On December 22, 2023, after consultation with his medical team, he was admitted to Walter Reed National Military Medical Center and underwent a minimally invasive surgical procedure called a prostatectomy to treat and cure…

Judge Henderson sounds skeptical of the claim that Trump was acting within his official duties. I think it is paradoxical to say that his constitutional duty to take care that the laws be faithfully executed allows him to violate criminal law,” Judge Henderson said.

Judge Pan asks, “Could a president order Seal Team Six to assassinate a political rival?” John Sauer answers that he “would have to be speedily impeached and convicted.”Judge Pan: “I asked you a yes or no question.”

name: Anderson Cooper
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Frequently reports negatively on conservatives such as Donald Trump, calling him an Obese Turtle.”
Scientific Views: Supports action on climate change and reports accurately on Covid-19.
Social Views: Anderson Cooper supports Gay marriage.
twits: I just posted a new episode of #AllThereIs, my podcast about grief. It’s a really moving conversation with Ashley Judd. When her mom Naomi Judd died in 2022, after a long struggle with mental illness, Ashley found her. In this deeply revealing, and insightful conversation Ashley…

The grief around the loss of a child is rarely spoken about. In a new episode of my grief podcast #AllThereIs I talk about it with a young mom who lost her daughter during her pregnancy. Link in bio or listen wherever you get your podcasts.

No American president has ever sat down for such a personal interview about grief and loss. I hope it encourages others to talk about the grief they feel. #AllThereIs is available wherever you get your podcasts. https://link.chtbl.com/8ioBNvf3

Season 2 of #AllThereIs, my podcast about facing grief and learning from loss starts today. Episode 1 is available on @ApplePodcasts and @Spotify or wherever you get your podcasts. Link here: https://link.chtbl.com/9ol62fz2
Spoke with @POTUS about grief and loss for season 2 of my podcast ALL THERE IS. Season 2 starts November 29th.  Season 1 is available now wherever you get your podcasts.
What happened at the music festival last Saturday is just now becoming more clear, particularly the killings inside bomb shelters where people were hiding
My new book ASTOR - The Rise And Fall Of An American Fortune debuted at #3 on the NYTimes Bestseller List! Link in bio to order!

My friend @MitchAlbom oversees an orphanage & school in #Haiti that is caught in the crossfire of gang violence. He is raising funds to help increase security in a very difficult situation. I’ve donated. If interested here is more information.

Just posted a new episode of All There Is, my podcast about loss and grief. #LaurieAnderson @OnlyAnExpert joins me to talk about the loss of her husband #LouReed. It’s a moving, fascinating, and often funny conversation. Available on @ApplePodcasts or wherever you get podcasts.

name: Lou Dobbs
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Lou Dobbs is a strong supporter of former President Trump. He is known for backing conspiracy theories such as the Birther conspiracy theory, false voter fraud claims, and an anti-immigration stance. Further, he was named in a $2.7 billion defamation lawsuit filed by voting technology company Smartmatic due to his false voter fraud claims.
Scientific Views: Rejects the scientific consensus on climate change. Misleads by asserting climate change is a United Nations plot to take over the world.”
Social Views:  Pro-abortion rights, against gun control; fiscally conservative, strongly anti-immigration, especially from Mexico and Central America.

Social Views: Pro gay marriage.

name: Steve Doocy
Bias Analysis: Political Views:  Frequently praised former President Donald Trump and is a registered Republican. However, in 2021 he debunked former President Trump’s election fraud conspiracy theories.

Scientific Views: He states, I am of the opinion that the globe is getting warmer, and it’s hard for me to believe that man does not have some sort of impact on that.” He has also promoted Covid-19 misinformation but apologized.
Social Views: He is Pro-Life, Pro gay marriage.

name: Maggie Haberman
Bias Analysis: Political Views: The right criticizes her as trying to hurt former President Trump. The Left also criticizes Haberman’s reporting as gossip-like and soft on the right. The main criticism of Haberman is getting scoops through family influence. She has also been critical of President Joe Biden, calling him a Flawed Candidate.”
Scientific Views: Reports accurately on Covid-19.
Social Views: Supports gay rights.
twits: Christie suspends his campaign, saying he wants to know that he in no way enabled Trump becoming president again.

It remains to be seen whether Haley is a beneficiary of Christie exiting the race. But it brings to a close the only candidacy able to attract media attention who has directly called Trump out repeatedly.

Donald Trump wants you to be angry every day because he's angry, Christie says. He reminds the crowd he's known Trump for 22 years. If you put him back behind the desk in the Oval Office and a choice comes...as to whether he puts himself first or voters first, he'll pick him.

As ABC reported, Trump wants to do his own summation, something he mentioned in passing when he called the Times last week. His lawyers are preparing for him to speak for part of the closing arguments. But it’s likely up to the judge whether he can.

name: Chris Hayes
Bias Analysis: Political Views: Chris Hayes has stated that the Republican party is radicalizing against democracy.” He has also called the GOP One Of Worst Parties In Power In Entire Democratic World.” Further, during the Trump administration, he frequently denigrated the former President with a statement such as, We are seeing the effects of the toxic, devastating legacy of Donald Trump right now in the places that supported him the most.” Finally, Hayes has been criticized by Democrats for covering sexual assault allegations levied at then Former Vice President Biden.
Scientific Views: Advocates for climate action. Reports accurately on Covid-19.
Social Views: Pro-immigration, supports gay marriage and LGBTQ rights, supports racial equity, and Black Lives Matter.
